input_text:
Job Title: Barista - Starbucks | Full-Time [$13.75/hr + tips] 

Location: Austin, TX

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Management, Manufacturing

Description:
Organization- Hyatt Regency Austin

Summary

Nestled on the shores of Lady Bird Lake, in the heart of downtown Austin is, Hyatt Regency Austin, where c aring for people to be their best is our purpose and the foundation of all that we do!

This is an exciting opportunity to join the Starbucks Team at Hyatt Regency Austin! The Starbucks Barista will provide service in the Starbucks located on the property of Hyatt Regency Austin. This position will be responsible for fulfilling guest orders preparing beverages in accordance with menu standards and providing a welcoming and clean environment for guests.

BENEFITS! | LOVE WHERE YOU WORK! | Hyatt is proud to be named to Fortune’s list of “ 100 Best Companies to Work For ” for the tenth year in a row! With more than 127,000 colleagues across 65 countries, we embrace all cultures, races, ethnicities, genders, sexual orientations, ages, abilities, perspectives, and ways of thinking. Our culture is one that empowers every individual to be his or her best, and such authentic connection inspires the way we care for each other and for our guests.

We care for people so they can be their best. Our colleagues enjoy:

 Career Growth and Advancement – Hyatt believes strongly in promoting from within. We offer training, skills development & career mobility, providing opportunities for advancement at every level Affordable Benefits after 30 days – full-time colleagues are eligible for medical, dental, vision, life, LTD, STD Referral Bonuses up to $500.00 - for bringing new members to our team Discounted Room Nights - at Hyatt Hotels around the world  12 Free Hyatt Room Nights per year – after 90 days of service Free Parking – Downtown Austin in our on-site garage! Discounted Bus Passes – subsidized by Hyatt, paid through payroll deduction  Paid Time Off – after 90 days of service Healthcare FSA - saves you money for medical expenses Financial Assistance – T uition & Gym reimbursement Financial Perks - 401(k) w/ company match & discounted employee stock purchase plan Employee Assistance – Daily employee meal, 24/7 emotional support, legal guidance, personal & financial resources

Hyatt is an equal employment opportunity and affirmative action employer. We do not discriminate on the basis of race, color, gender, gender identity, sexual orientation, marital status, pregnancy, national origin, ancestry, age, religion, disability, veteran status, genetic information, citizenship status or any other group protected by law.

Qualifications

 Previous Barista experience preferred  A true desire to satisfy the needs of others in a fast paced environment.  Food Handler's certification is required  Refined verbal communication skills  Ability to stand for long periods of time  Ability to lift, pull, and push a moderate weight (about 25 pounds)

Experience Level (if available): Entry level

output_json.title: Barista - Starbucks
output_json.summary: Join the Starbucks Team at Hyatt Regency Austin as a Barista.

Providing welcoming and clean environment for guests

Paid Time Off – after 90 days of service

Financial Perks - 401(k) w/ company match & discounted employee stock purchase plan
